title: Representation and evolution of urban weather boundary conditions in downtown Chicago
excerpt: Led bi-weekly calls with 3-4 other national labs and helped organize goals and tasks for 2018 and 2019. The project funding was increased from $300k in FY17 to $1M in FY18 and is projected to further rise to $2.5M in FY19.  I was the group leader and representative for the Urban ECP project at the Energy System Modeling Track, ECP Annual Meeting, Knoxville 2017

title: Accelerating Flash-X Simulations with Asynchronous I/O
venue: 2022 IEEE/ACM International Parallel Data Systems Workshop (PDSW)
excerpt: First part of work as a part of ECP project: Flash-X I/O modernization using AsyncIO from HDF5
